biotools.summary: Bollito is a Snakemake pipeline that performs a comprehensive single-cell RNA-seq analysis, covering both the basic steps (QC, alignment, quantification and cell specific QC) and more advanced downstream analyses (clustering, diferential expresion, trajectory inference, functional analysis and RNA velocity).

bioschemas.name: bollito
